column4: hiking through lovely Juniper forests and enjoy the spectacular landscape that surrounds this pristine lake."
column11:
'information':

The best time to visit the park is in the spring
column12: summer and autumn. As more people are now visiting the park
column13: tourist services and infrastructure have developed over the years. However
column15:
it is still advisable to be self-sufficient if you are traveling alone. Lake Rara is also a popular pilgrimage site for Nepalis.
